Events that occurred on 31 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1912 - German translator Margaret Carroux is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 72.
1981 - The thirteenth episode of the 1981 radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2018 - The Hobbit Facsimile Gift Edition is published in the UK.
2025 - After 12 years in the role, Shaun Gunner steps down as Chair of The Tolkien Society to become its first Chief Executive Officer. He is succeeded as Acting Chair by Daniel Helen.[1]

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
